    • Method Detail

      • connectingServer

        public boolean connectingServer()
        trys to connect the server and gives feedback
        Returns:
        true only if the server was connected successful

      • login

        public int login(java.lang.String pParkingPlaceNumber,
                 java.lang.String pCheckCode)
        Checks wheather an parkingPlaceID with the checkcode is avaiable
        Parameters:
        pParkingPlaceNumber - the id of the parking place
        pCheckCode - the checksum of the parking place
        Returns:
        Enums.serverResponseWrongCheckCode only if the checkcode ist wrong but the id is correct
        Enums.serverResponseWrongID only if the id is wrong
        Enums.serverConnectionLost only if the connection is not avaiable
        Enums.serverResponseLoginCorrect only if the process was successfull

      • logoff

        public void logoff()
        sends the logoff code closes the Streams

      • sendNumberOfFreeParkingPlaces

        public int sendNumberOfFreeParkingPlaces(int number)
        sends the number of the free parking places to the server
        Parameters:
        number - the number of free parking palaces
        Returns:
        Enums.successfullSendNumberOfFreeParkingPlaces only if the process was successfull
        Enums.failedToSendNumberOfFreeParkingPlaces only if the process failed

      • oneLessFreeParkingPlace

        public int oneLessFreeParkingPlace()
        sends the command for decreasing the number of free parking places
        Returns:
        Enums.successfullSendOneLessFreeParkingPlaces only if the process was successfull
        Enums.failedToSendOneLessFreeParkingPlaces only if the process failed

      • oneMoreFreeParkingPlace

        public int oneMoreFreeParkingPlace()
        sends the command for increasing the number of free parking places
        Returns:
        Enums.successfullSendOneMoreFreeParkingPlaces only if the process was successfull
        Enums.failedToSendOneMoreFreeParkingPlaces only if the process failed
